# IUserService.DeleteUserAsync method

Deletes a user from a specific project.

```csharp
public Task DeleteUserAsync(int projectId, int userId)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| projectId | The project ID. |
| userId | The user ID. |

## Return Value

A task representing the async operation.
